page.title: 15REDHILLS TODAY
page.content: {Redhills}is on the outskirts of{ {Exeter.}You go only one mile and you are in the countryside.{Redhills}is in two separate parts, Lower Redhills and Higher Redhills. In between is a massive hill that is very steep. It takes about ten or fifteen minutes to walk up. During the summer it is very tiresome to walk up the hill. Up at the top of{Redhills}there are new houses being built which are lower down in the valley. I live on a very new estate which was built about three years ago.{ { } The area is called{Redhills}because before peole started to build here there were hills which were red because of the{colour of the soil. The{soil}is very hard to dig when planting shrubs or trees.
